lenders.name: Lin
lenders.loan_because: people need help and I am fortunate enough to help wherever I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to me -- if a $25 loan can help someone, then I it's great that I can be in the position to do so.

lenders.name: Millie
lenders.loan_because: There are people in need.

lenders.name: Bernhard69
lenders.loan_because: I don't like donate blindly. I want to support people who help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a college professor. I teach American Government to young students.

lenders.name: Kuo Family

lenders.name: Beth & Sterlyn
lenders.loan_because: My college professor introduced me to this and I was so touched.  As a student I don't have much money. To know I can help someone and in the end it costs me nothing except a few moments of my time and a kind gesture is so rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college to get my bachelors degree in business.  I hope  to have a management position some day.

lenders.name: Kjersti

lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse. I live in Norway and have three children.

lenders.name: Boris

lenders.occupational_info: Developing websites and web applications.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: The leverage from the money loaned will have a far greater impact--hopefully for the better--than anything I could possibly have done here in the U.S.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide classroom support to nursing professors at UCLA

lenders.name: Storesund family
lenders.loan_because: We belive this is the best way to help people.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: people deserve a living *and* dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach literature, history, and film at a university.

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.occupational_info: I make art and web pages.

lenders.name: Allen & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We feel fortunate in life and would like to do our part to help others in need.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Grethe

lenders.name: Katey

lenders.occupational_info: I work to help companies become more profitable by creating brochure, flyers, websites, etc.

lenders.name: Kai Ivar
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because:
I have seen with my own eyes what happens to people desperate enough to leave their home country, trying to get to Europe in search of a better life. 

If I can make a contribution to someone so they can move on to develop their skills and stand on their own feet, a small but important change has been made. 
It may not be much, considering the world's many problems. But I am certain that my small contribution makes a lot of difference for this one person in need and for his/her family.

lenders.name: Hello Obento
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the power of paying it forward.  Supporting the entrepreneurial spirit empowers a community to remain unique and whole.  

$25 and you can be your own Warren Buffet.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I hope for change.

lenders.name: Charity
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of real people.

lenders.name: Jan-Erik
lenders.loan_because: I care!!
lenders.occupational_info: General manager for a company that sell Automatic External Defibrillators and train people in school, kindergarden and company´s to use them.

lenders.name: Tarjei
lenders.loan_because: Its a good thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Research Administration

lenders.name: Adeel
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Henriette
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John Tore
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a change.

lenders.name: Sondre
lenders.loan_because: I think that we all have an obligation to help others if we are in a position to do so! Help people to help themselves! =)

lenders.name: Tore

lenders.name: konami

lenders.name: Richard

lenders.name: Oscar

lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: Payton Economics
lenders.loan_because: We are a collection of AP Microeconomics students who attend Payton College Prep High School in Chicago, IL.  We have examined the Nobel Prize winning work of Muhammad Yunus.  Kiva's innovative infrastructure -- which enables thousands to function as bankers to the poor -- provides a powerful extension of Yunus' life's work.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students who strive to move beyond the four walls of our classroom.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.occupation: CTO of a Telecom Solution Developer company
lenders.loan_because: I like the direct and concrete approach on where my money is going. Compare this to certain Norwegian aid-organizations where only a small percentage (10% - 40%) is actually going to aid, the rest is spent on "administrative issues".
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is about making communication between people possible with new and cheaper technology.

VoIP is going to make a huge impact on the way people in developing countries will communicate with each other in the future.

lenders.name: Dag Robert
lenders.occupation: Being a little boy, working in kindergarden
lenders.loan_because: My mum and dad has given my weekly allowance to people who need it more than me. I like to help people to get a better life, and give my small contribution.
lenders.occupational_info:
Update: moved to north of Norway, to Hammerfest. Still busy. My favourite toy now is snowscooter. Looking forward to try one when snow comes.

Update: I just celebrated my 2 years birthday. I`ve learned to talk a little bit. Still busy working in kindergarden, which I think is very fun.

Update: Now I`m 1,5 years old. I`ve learned go walk and now the world is open for me :-). I`ve also got my first job going to kindergarden, that`s fun. I enjoy it very much.

Update: Now I`m 9 months old, I`ve just learned to crawl and stand up. Now my parents are more busy keeping things out of my hands.

Original text: Due to that I`m only 4 month`s old my full days work is eating and sleeping for the time beeing.

lenders.name: Philosophy Texas State
lenders.loan_because: We believe we are all sharing the same journey through time and space and we want to empower our fellow travelers.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach philosophy at a State University in Texas

lenders.name: Oivind
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help a little

lenders.name: Tor-Odd
lenders.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I give a loan

lenders.name: Cybertom
lenders.loan_because:
By making such small amounts available to people in need, i am not only giving these people a chance to give themselves a better life - but also their family and their community. Helping them to build a future in their own environment is the future!

 So instead of eating out tonight, I  invested USD 25,- in someones life, hoping that the people I invest in and believe in, will be able to create a future in their own environment. AND, I recommend everyone else to do the same!

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that I'm not giving to a faceless organization, I'm giving to a person.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to empower our neighbors, giving them opportunities to become economically independent, improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities. (Kiva's mission statement)
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a broker at AG Edwards (an investment firm). I answer phones and prepare documents for meetings with clients.

lenders.occupational_info: i work in a city-hall of a town with 50.000 people. I am a teacher for computers and software for the other comrades in the city-hall.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a Christian School for Christian families.

lenders.name: Microstockgroup.com
lenders.loan_because: It is important.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a entrepreneur I understand the need for capital to get something started.  Kiva provides a great opportunity connecting entrepreneurial spirits around the world.  

Every yearly membership fee that Microstockgroup.com receives will first be sent to Kiva.  Once the Kiva loan has been repaid, the membership fee will then go to support the microstockgroup website.

lenders.name: Sombra
lenders.loan_because: I'm pretty lucky, I have enough to live and I would like to help other people to live happier and with a better future

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help others around the world, by investing in people's business, so they can have an oppertunity to make a living and increase their income:)

lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: catherina
lenders.loan_because: I think lending out money this way is the best way to be able to help people make a future for themselves. I also like the connection to the people I help by following their progress, and I like to see that it actually works! I tryed one loan to start with. Now that I see it works, I decided to put in 4 more loans around the world. I will keep doing so as i think Kiva is doing wonderful work here ! :-)

lenders.name: Knut
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of making the world a littlebit better place to live. How often do we spend money for things that we realy don't need, and put it away after a short time? I feel I get a lot more "interest" of lending money to people that realy need the money than spend it on worthless things. Kiva gives me the opportunity to help people around the world. For me is this a "penny" issue, but it can make such a huge difference in another's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Working at the Norwegian Public Roads Administration

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I love the concept that people all around the world can get together an loan to others to make them successful.   I especially like the opportunity to empower women who have established their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: As a software project manager, I am responsible for ensuring that our products are shipped on time, are of high quality and that I can report anything that prevents a high-quality, on-time release to our executives.

lenders.loan_because: I hope to give someone who is in need a chance in life.

lenders.loan_because: I have great respect for people who actively try to make a better life for themselves - they deserve the help they can get.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I care about people worldwide, but have a special connection to Bolivia, South America.  We lived for some years in Bolivia and made several very good friends.  Also, our dog, Whiskey, was born in El Alto, Bolivia and now resides with us in Colorado.
lenders.occupational_info: I create functional stoneware pottery for everyday use.

lenders.name: Joe & Monica
lenders.loan_because: i could use the karma

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: It is always the little things that have the biggest impact.  I firmly believe that "life is a gift and we should live every moment as a thank you note!" Helping others through Kiva is one way I show my gratitude and make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse and also fundraise for a local non-profit that serves the disabled in my community.

lenders.name: Divina del-Sol
lenders.loan_because:
I am richly blessed.

lenders.occupational_info: All forms of consulting, networking, & empowerment.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I was in business for years and know how hard it is for people to get started. I was fortunate and want others to have the chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: retail furniture sales  which I parlayed into owning of real estate investments.

lenders.name: CoreTrek
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping others and think this is a great way of contributing. We are currently seven people from CoreTrek: Frode Helgesen, Trond Ursin, Johan Fredrik Varen,  John Michaelsen, Ole Bergesen, Espen Mandel and Aslak Evang
lenders.occupational_info: We develop websites, portals, intranets and more, using php and other open source tools.

lenders.name: Stein Erik og Monica
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we would like to help people start with their own small business.

lenders.name: Axel
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Wendy P.
lenders.loan_because: I just paid off my own loans and I am very grateful that they were available to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and learn, have amazing family and friends, and am very lucky.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: the world needs more $ and less poverty
lenders.occupational_info: Educator

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference in the lives of others. I just want to help improve the world in anyway that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to a University, where I study to one day become a doctor. I also help teach children in a local elementary school.

lenders.name: Kjell
lenders.loan_because: This kind of help works!
lenders.occupational_info: My time as retired is extremely exciting and interesting. Can do whatever I like!

lenders.name: simonidossos
lenders.loan_because:
I want to see how kiva actually works. 

I am more then sceptical that there is any future in lending money in this fashion and am afraid, that the lack of sustainability will one day not only leave some westerners without their "investments", but rather the microfinance sector in the third world still underdeveloped. 

Microfinance as microcredit without microsaving is never a good idea. Please make sure you check on your MFIs's mixmarket profile. If they have no savers, don't fund them. They use your interest free money to destroy a local and sustainable solution.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting dreams and goals.  I would not be who I am without my family and friends, and I have the chance to give back to the world what they have given to me.

lenders.name: Roma
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: visual interpretations

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Family is family...wherever we are.

lenders.name: Tove
lenders.loan_because: It's good karma!

lenders.name: Augustus
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a good life.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help make a difference in the lives of people willing to put in hard work to get ahead in life.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: This is truly a great program, helping those that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Transcribe medical dictation from health care providers for hospital.

lenders.name: Ladan
lenders.loan_because:
"Be the change that you want to see in the world."
~Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Manon
lenders.loan_because: I want everybody to have the same oppertunities in life I had.

lenders.name: Regine
lenders.loan_because: ..a small gesture can make a big difference...
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young adults nursing

lenders.name: Esther

lenders.loan_because: I want to do my little part to end poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a High School teacher in Economics/Business

lenders.occupational_info: i go to school in holland. you could call it high school.

lenders.name: Antionetta
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy assisting others and providing them with the necessary tools to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Human Service field. It  has always been my passion to assist those in need. If you have faith in another person, that will motivate them to succeed.

lenders.loan_because: I like to do somethning for people who have less than me.
lenders.occupational_info: i am retired

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because: I want to make my contribution. I feel very privilaged in my own life, and this is a simple way to share some of my own good.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Lending is easy, and the right thing to do.  Microfinance can greatly increase the quality of life in most places around the world.

lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have with people, who need the most.
lenders.occupational_info: People development manager in a company.

lenders.name: Mihaela
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something for people less fortunate than me!
lenders.occupational_info: I come from Romania where I was a company-lawyer. In Holland I am translator and I teach Romanian language to Duch people.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.loan_because: When I started my business I was very lucky - I had the capital needed. It's tough and very hard work to start and build a business - if you don't have the capital, then that's another head ache. Think this is a great way to help take away one of the challenges of being an entrepreneur. Hope the lending limit is removed soon.
lenders.occupational_info: My company does what is called business communication. This means we make marketing brochures, advertisements, financial reports and other communication, such as websites, for our clients so they can send or give them to interested people, like shareholders.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: It is a start to a better world. To awknowledge every human being in the world,  where all is shared equally.

lenders.name: Jan Maarten
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Pieter
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hard working people the chance to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: Access to finance facilitates socio-economic development.

lenders.name: Vil Marie
lenders.loan_because: Every body needs help and if I can give them help then that gives me hope that I might get one step closer to filling my dream of becoming an enterprenauer.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and write code for internet web pages.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's a fantastic and easy way to really help someone with her or his business

lenders.name: Renee Beneteau
lenders.loan_because: giving is contagious ...
lenders.occupational_info: A CFRE with 20+ years of innovating for good.

lenders.name: Ivo
lenders.loan_because: it's the best way of helping .

lenders.name: Jean-Louis
lenders.loan_because: In spite of the fact that my overall income, having a heart disease, is not enough to live, and to much to die (western standards), there's always some money left to be able to get someone else in drive- position.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in park- position because of a heart disease. Employers just squeezed the last bit of energy out of me, had to be in kick-down position always so I ran dry on oil and I got kicked out. That's the way 'developed' countries like the Netherlands treat their working force.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is my feeling that we are all one, walking the same path towards the same goal. It's our love and support for one another that makes it possible to endure. Helping people to succeed is the path to being successful yourself.

lenders.name: Rob en Truus
lenders.loan_because:
Good initiative and we love Africa.
we visit it as often as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Buiding supervisor now retired,My wife is still working on a school as aministrationworker.

lenders.name: Shaun
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do
lenders.occupational_info: Network operations manager for online mystery shopping community

lenders.name: Cuauhtemoc
lenders.loan_because: Soy una persona discapacitada y no encuentro empleo asi que tengo un pequeño taller en mi casa donde fabrico zapatillas de ballet,sin embargo no tengo la maquinaria suficiente para esto necesito 1,200 dolares para comprar maquinaria y equipo y armar mi taller de fabricacion de zapatillas de ballet
lenders.occupational_info: Hago zapatillas de ballet, para bailarinas, estudiantes y artistas de ballet de fama internacional, tengo experiencia de mas de 10 años

lenders.name: Ragnhild
lenders.loan_because:
- I think the world in general is unbearably unfair, but microfinance is a fair way to do a little bit of something about it. Every little action counts. 
- I run my own little one-woman-business and feel somewhat related to the kiva-entrepreneurs.
- When the nations of my part of the world still are exploiting others by claiming their legitime or illegitime loans repaid with interest, then the least I can do is to make a couple of interest-free loans myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I do editing, proofreading and translations mainly for publishing houses, and also give private Norwegian lessons to immigrants.

lenders.name: kristine
lenders.loan_because: for the first time I feel I can help somebody developing their business or caring for their family and I actually know where my money goes to.

lenders.name: Tomek
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to help someone who needs my help - and it's so simple!

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Passion. Remember, you could just lend the same money a month, what you spend on coffee a day.

lenders.name: Rodolfo

lenders.occupational_info:
Entrepeneur in supporting my neighbours/brothers to develop theirselves to live an humanity live with their families.

lenders.loan_because: God has provided.
lenders.occupational_info: Easing the pain and hardships of others.

lenders.occupational_info: i am a 49 years old hairdresser with a wife and two children

lenders.name: anja

Everyone should have opportunity.

lenders.loan_because: Money talks - period.

lenders.name: Curtis

lenders.name: Jenjer - FJJ Creations

I love giving back what God has blessed me with, there was a time in my life when I needed to be blessed. 
Now it's my turn and responsibility to give that back, and I do gladly with 100% love & joy.
Kiva is a great transparent giving channel.

lenders.name: Adelle
lenders.loan_because: I know that the only way can change the world is one person at a time, and that it is my duty to do my share to help repair this broken world. For me it is a mitzvah, and one I do gladly.  .
lenders.occupational_info: I am a disabled 46 year old Jewish woman who lives in an Assisted Living Complex with 2 canaries and an old pug dog.  I like to study, play computer games and listen to talking books.  When i am not doing that work, I am  painting Judaic Folk Art.

lenders.name: Jason Boutwell
lenders.loan_because: The older I get the more I realize how lucky I (we) are to live in a prosporus nation  where opportunity and freedom are expected and taken for granted.  We are blessed and I figure it is our duty to share the opportunity to create freedom to those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others improve thier business thru a better understanding of  technology.

"Aide toi et le ciel t'aidera"

lenders.name: Uli

lenders.occupational_info: I study a lot.  I learn a lot about other parts of the world, especially countries with differing economies and countries at war.  As an American, I am humbled by what I see.
